overview: Somewhere In The Stratosphere Acoustic was filmed during the band's Anything And Everything: An Acoustic Evening With Shinedown 2011 tour. It includes a live set of the show featuring tracks from their platinum plus selling album Sound Of Madness. With six number 1 album singles under their belt, the band puts an acoustic spin on "Devour", "The Crow & The Butterfly", "Second Chance" and many more from their rich catalog of hits.
title: Shinedown: Anything and Everything
